sen.e: Shigehira was the fifth son of TAIRA no Kiyomori, the aristocrat with the ranks of Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank) and Konoe no chujo (middle captain of the palace guards), and the general who invaded and conquered Nanto (Nara) by burning down its Kofuku-ji Temple and Todai-ji Temple in 1180.
